alert.note: Alert for Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 5:33PM CDT until November 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL NAVARRO COUNTY... At 533 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Trinidad Lake, or 16 miles southwest of Athens, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Richland-Chambers Reservoir. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
